General.Name: Huxen Corp
General.Description: Huxen Corporation provides office equipment in Taiwan. The company offers photocopiers, multifunctional business machines, laser printers, digital printing machines, large image output machines, speed printers, fast print peripherals, telephone exchange NEC switchboard systems, switch peripheral voicemail recording systems, billing systems, Fortinet firewall, internet goods, and wireless base station switches. It also provides cloud commodity systems; software systems comprising information security management, printing management, process management, and print application systems; and video systems, including commercial projectors, video conferencing systems, video conferencing lens, video conferencing value-added products, cloud video conferencing systems, and electronic whiteboards. In addition, the company engages in machine sales maintenance, and leasing business. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.2, Section 5, Xinyi Road, Taipei, Taiwan
